mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (content_type, content_id, user_id, content, parent_id, status, like_count, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{contentType}, #{contentId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{status}, #{likeCount}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, content_type, content_id, user_id, content, parent_id, status, like_count, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM comment WHERE content_type = #{contentType} AND content_id = #{contentId} AND del_flag = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, content_type, content_id, user_id, content, parent_id, status, like_count, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM comment WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT id, content_type, content_id, user_id, content, parent_id, status, like_count, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0
